input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Chore Pant"
Reference Product Description:
The Chore Pant in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas from Taylor Stitch 12.5-oz. 100% organic cotton canvas. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton SF Map pocketing. Stone washed for a worn in look and feel. Angled front slash pockets for easy entry. Two half-lined back patch pockets. Signature double-knee reinforced construction. Pen sleeve on both front panels. Front and back pockets bar-tacked at stress points. Button fly closure. Double-needle construction throughout. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Jetsetter Italian Linen Dress Suit Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Relaxed Taper Air Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Women's Utility Wide-leg Pants'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Venga Rock Pants'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Iron Forge Hemp Canvas Double Knee Pants'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Women's Brandon Pant'
  - Name='Used Patagonia Worn Wear-M's Kerf Cut Work Pants'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Venga Rock Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Single Knee Pant'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Nash OG Double Knee Pant'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Regular Cargo Pant'
  - Name='Men Carhartt WIP Drewe Pants'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Men Cole Cargo Pant'
  - Name='Outerknown Men's Sur Sweatpants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Wide Straight Tall Jeans'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Terravia Trail Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Painter Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Stevens Herringbone Linen Trousers'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Camp Pants in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Breakwater Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Relaxed Linen Blend Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Stretch Selvedge Slim Jeans'
  - Name='Outerknown The Cove Slim Jean'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Altvia Trail Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Jetsetter Italian Linen Dress Suit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are dress suit pants made from linen, targeting a formal style distinctly different from casual, durable chore pants made from heavy organic cotton canvas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Relaxed Taper Air Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual men's pants with a tapered chino style, somewhat similar in use but lighter material and no mention of reinforced construction or workwear features.
Utility style pants share some functional intent, but women's wide-leg cut and likely different construction reduce closeness to chore pant.
Outdoor technical pants geared towards rugged use; likely durable and functional like chore pants, though possibly lighter materials and less traditional construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Iron Forge Hemp Canvas Double Knee Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Double knee reinforcement and hemp canvas construction closely match the chore pant's emphasis on durability and reinforced workwear style.
Carhartt WIP known for workwear style; pants likely durable and casual but womenâ€™s fit and model differ somewhat from the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Used Patagonia Worn Wear-M's Kerf Cut Work Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Work pants from Patagonia designed for rugged use, aligned in purpose and construction with chore pants, though details differ.
See above. Durable outdoor pants with likely similar utility but lighter technical design differing from canvas chore pants.
Casual men's chino pants with performance fabric are more refined and lighter, less focused on rugged reinforcement compared to chore pants.
Carhartt WIP workwear pants with reinforced single knee feature close to double-knee chore pant in purpose, though some construction difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt WIP Nash OG Double Knee Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Double knee durable work pants from Carhartt WIP very close in function, silhouette, and construction style to Taylor Stitch chore pant.
Cargo pants with workwear durability align somewhat with chore pant but cargo pockets and fit differ from traditional chore pant style.
Men's workwear pants from Carhartt WIP, likely durable and casual but may differ in specific reinforcement and fit details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt WIP Men Cole Cargo Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above; cargo style adds different pocketing, somewhat divergent from chore pant's simpler design.
Sweatpants are casual loungewear with stretchy knit fabric; very different in construction, purpose, and silhouette from chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Wide Straight Tall Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Denim jeans have rugged construction and casual use overlap with chore pants, but different fabric and typical stitching details.
Trail pants focus on outdoor activity durability and comfort, somewhat matching functionality but usually lighter and more flexible than chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Painter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close product line; painter pants share organic cotton construction and workwear features, closely related to chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Stevens Herringbone Linen Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Linen trousers are lighter, dressier pants with different fabric and silhouette, not matching rugged chore pant character.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Camp Pants in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fabric used and organic cotton construction; camp pants serve casual rugged wear, very close though possibly different cut and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Breakwater Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton pants from same brand, likely casual and durable but may have different style and construction details than chore pant.
Lightweight linen blend material and relaxed style differ significantly from heavy canvas chore pant in durability and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Stretch Selvedge Slim Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Denim jeans with stretch and slim fit relate to rugged casual wear but differ in fabric weight, reinforcement, and silhouette from chore pants.
Slim fit jeans in denim fabric offer casual ruggedness, some overlap, but distinct fabric and construction from chore pant.
Trail pants built for outdoor activities have similar rugged function but differ in material and detailed construction from canvas chore pants.
